programme.title: Weightlifting | Olympic Qualifier | Day 3 | Grand Prix I | Havana
programme.desc: Watch the women's 55kg and men's 61kg Group A Weightlifting competitions and join us for the Olympic Qualifier and IWF Grand Prix I in Havana, Cuba.

programme.title: Boxing vs weightlifting with Shimizu Satoshi & Takao Hiroaki | Sports Swap Japan
programme.desc: Can Olympic boxing bronze medallist snatch 40 kg on his first attempt?

programme.desc: What happens when a World Champion Weightlifter tries to dive? How strong is the world's best diver?

programme.title: Breaking | Olympic Qualifier | Final Day | African Championship | Rabat
programme.desc: Watch the final day of the Olympic Qualifier and African Breaking Championship in Rabat, Morocco.

programme.title: Women's Alpine Combined Slalom - Alpine Skiing | Beijing 2022 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 17/02/2022 at the Nat Alpine Ski Ctr - Technical. Michelle Gisin (SUI) claimed the gold medal, Wendy Holdener (SUI) won the silver and Federica Brignone (ITA) completed the podium

programme.title: Women's Alpine Combined Downhill - Alpine Skiing | Beijing 2022 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 17/02/2022 at the Nat Alpine Ski Ctr - Speed. Best result in the woman's competition was achieved by Christine Scheyer (AUT) with 1:32.42, Ester Ledecka (CZE) made the second fastest time with 1:32.43 and Ramona Siebenhofer (AUT) was third with 1:32.56

programme.title: Team LH & 4x5km - Nordic Combined | Beijing 2022 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 17/02/2022 at the Zhangjiakou Crs-Ctry Ctr. Norway ended up claiming the gold medal, Germany won silver and Japan completed the podium with the bronze

programme.title: Women's 1000m - Speed Skating | Beijing 2022 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 17/02/2022 at the National Speed Skating Oval. A new Olympic Record was achieved by gold medalist Miho Takagi (JPN) with 1:13.19, Jutta Leerdam (NED) claimed the Silver while Brittany Bowe (USA) completed the podium

programme.title: CAN - USA - Women's Gold Medal Match - Ice Hockey | Beijing 2022 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 17/02/2022 at the Wukesong Sports Centre. Final Score: CAN 3:2 USA

programme.title: Men's 15km Mass Start - Biathlon | Beijing 2022 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 18/02/2022 at the Zhangjiakou Biathlon Ctr. Johannes Thingnes Boe (NOR) won his 4th Gold at Beijing 2022. Martin Ponsiluoma (SWE) took Silver, finishing 40.3 seconds behind Boe, and Vetle Sjaastad Christiansen (NOR) came in 3rd place claiming a bronze medal

programme.title: Men's 1000m - Speed Skating | Beijing 2022 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 18/02/2022 at the National Speed Skating Oval. Thomas Krol (NED) claimed the gold medal while Laurent Dubreuil (CAN) took the silver and Haavard Lorentzen (NOR) completed the podium with the bronze

programme.title: Men's Ski Cross Final - Freestyle Skiing | Beijing 2022 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 18/02/2022 at the Genting Snow Park - P & X. Ryan Regez (SUI) claimed the gold medal, Alex Fiva (SUI) won the silver and Sergey Ridzik (ROC) completed the podium

programme.title: Women's Freeski Halfpipe Final - Freestyle Skiing | Beijing 2022 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 18/02/2022 at the Genting Snow Park - SS & HP. Ailing Eileen Gu (CHN) took home the gold medal with the Best Score of 95.25. Cassie Sharpe (CAN) claimed the silver and Rachael Karker (CAN) completed the podium with the bronze medal

programme.title: CAN - USA - Men's Bronze Medal Match - Curling | Beijing 2022 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 18/02/2022 at the Nat. Aquatics Ctr - Sheet B. Final Score: CAN 8:5 USA. Canada won the bronze medal.
